meanings.sent1: The judge made a fair and nonpartisan decision in the case.
meanings.sent2: It is important for journalists to remain nonpartisan in their reporting.
meanings.sent3: The nonpartisan referee called the game without showing favoritism.
meanings.sent4: Her nonpartisan attitude towards all students made her a beloved teacher.
meanings.sent5: The nonpartisan committee ensured equal opportunities for all candidates.

meanings.definition: Not affiliated with or supporting any political party.
meanings.sent1: The organization remains nonpartisan to avoid any political influence.
meanings.sent2: As a nonpartisan group, they focus on issues rather than party politics.
meanings.sent3: The nonpartisan event brought together people from all political backgrounds.
meanings.sent4: She decided to run for office as a nonpartisan candidate.
meanings.sent5: The nonpartisan stance of the organization promotes unity among members.
